title: Our Fully Loaded Getaway with Clipsal Trade was one for the books! üíØ
text: We couldn't have done this without our amazing customers, so a huge thank you to all who made it a truly unforgettable experience. Here are a few of our favourite snaps from Hamilton Island!

title: Fully Loaded Getaway | Day 2 üèÑüå∫ü§ø
text: After a rocking night at the Beach Party, everyone was ready to recharge their batteries and head out on Saturday morning for Whitehaven Beach. With clear skies and calm seas, they sailed off in style onboard a private charter boat - packed with plenty of activities including paddle boarding, beach cricket and some hiking along the way!

title: Fully Loaded Getaway | Day 1 üèñÔ∏èüå¥ü••
text: Last week, the Fully Loaded Getaway was off to a roaring start as our customers and great mates at Clipsal Trade joined us in paradise on Hamilton Island! After checking into the hotel, it all kicked-off with Cocktail Hour at the Swim Up Bar where they soaked up some rays while admiring stunning views.
